text: Mam ay sɨkop, mam ay ogɨnap kɨlop takaw tɨmel agɨl ma agjunɨmɨb. Bɨ olap mam ay kɨlop takaw tɨmel agɨl agjup akaŋ, kɨlop tɨg asɨkɨl ag gup ak, ne takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak abe takaw tɨmel agɨl agjuwɨl, tɨg asɨkɨl ag gup.4.11 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap, kɨli anɨgɨl gos nepal. Jemis ne takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak gos nɨŋɨd, takaw layn 11 mɨdeb ak tɨkup. Takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak anɨb ak, buk Wok Pris 19.18 nɨgɨnɨmɨn. Pen nad takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak tɨg asɨkɨl ag gɨpan ak, takaw anɨb ak kɨdek ma gɨl muk okok ma mɨdɨl, yad ke bɨawl tɨg asɨkep mɨdebin agɨl anɨgɨpan.
